name: bean-stash-chatbox
description: AI chatbox powered by Hack Club AI with Spotify integration

/chat/*.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://ai.hackclub.com https://accounts.spotify.com https://api.spotify.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;
